title: The Left Ear - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   School Life   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Movie   Betrayal   Coming of Age   Dead Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Triangles   Revenge   Unconditional Love
author: Rao Xueman   饶雪漫
description: High school student Li Er crushes on the handsome Xu Yi, who falls in love with Li Bala. After a series of events leads Li Er and Bala to become friends, four young lives become entwined, as they love and lose and grow.>
